name: map
description: Depicting a place, that can be used for reference or tactical play.

name: token
description: used to depict PCs or NPCs, top down, isometric or flat round.

name: Panel
description: For comics (often 3-panel spreads or full pages).

name: Scene
description: Art that includes a background, possibly with figures in it, more "traditional" art - not usually used for tactical purposes.
